CustomField.formula: IF( Most_Recent_Cadence_Next_Due_Date__c - TODAY() >=0, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif","Green Light",15,15), IF(AND(Most_Recent_Cadence_Next_Due_Date__c - TODAY() >= -7, Most_Recent_Cadence_Next_Due_Date__c - TODAY()<0),IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif","Orange Light",15,15), IF(Most_Recent_Cadence_Next_Due_Date__c - TODAY() <=-7, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif","Red Light",15,15),"")))
CustomField.label: Cadence Status
